channel.title: All items over 10000 turn to 9999
channel.description: well i got this tricky bug all my items i have added in like skill capes are in the 15000's and every time i try to pick one up it turns into 9999.. a null whats the problem!! please help

item.title: All items over 10000 turn to 9999
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

As ziplock has told you, you have gone to high in the id’s… from my experiance and seeing others posting on this subject the id’s you should use have to be like between 8000 and 15000 any higher than that and you will get cache damage.

correct me if i am wrong anyone but i think this is correct

Read full topic

item.title: All items over 10000 turn to 9999
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

i can spawn them fine its just if i use it it turnes into 9999[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2009, 10:19:53 pm[/size][hr]?? i can spawn in just when i use the item it gives me a 9999 and it equips it but if you take it off it turns to 9999 so does anybody want to help me out here!?

Read full topic

item.title: All items over 10000 turn to 9999
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

mathew000000000:

well i got this tricky bug all my items i have added in like skill capes are in the 15000’s and every time i try to pick one up it turns into 9999… a null whats the problem!! please help

You method that spawns items may not handle values that high for some reason; check the programming behind it.
